thread.title: Freedom Caucus Torn Over Paul Ryan for Speaker
thread.title_full: Freedom Caucus Torn Over Paul Ryan for Speaker

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Freedom Caucus Torn Over Paul Ryan for Speaker
text:
Freedom Caucus Torn Over Paul Ryan for Speaker October 21, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
Wall Street Journal : “If the group rejects Mr. Ryan, it would prolong turmoil within the GOP’s ranks and risks appearing implacable after pushing out Mr. Boehner and halting the rise of his No. 2, House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-CA). Republicans don’t have an alternative plan if Mr. Ryan isn’t elected speaker.” 
“In the contest of wills, Mr. Ryan may have the upper hand, because he is willing to walk away from the speakership. A father of three children who said he wouldn’t want to work weekends, Mr. Ryan is seen as the only Republican with the messaging skills and national name recognition to unify the fractured conference.” Related Posts   Which States Conceal Police Misconduct Records?
